skillShortDescription: A set of DevOPS skills for performing common operations tasks such as deployments, restarting a service and checking the status of a service
fullDescription: AlexaOPS is your virtual 24/7 DevOPS team that performs the most common operations tasks for you: deployments, application version checks, application status checking, restarting applications.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask OPS to deploy Application A
Alexa, ask OPS to restart Application A
Alexa, ask OPS how Application A is doing?
